import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs/internal/Observable'; import { of } from 'rxjs/internal/observable/of'; @Component({ selector: 'app-base-inputs', templateUrl: './base-inputs.component.html', styleUrls: ['./base-inputs.component.scss'] }) export class BaseInputsComponent implements OnInit { options$: Observable; constructor() { this.options$=of([1,2,3,4,5,6]); } ngOnInit(): void { } }
